title: Clicking download icon or link in displayed PDF ignores "ask where" setting
content: I have Firefox set to ask me where to download files that I want to download. It works for normal download links, but when I'm using my credit card company site's PDF viewer to look at a statement and I click on the download icon or link in the upper-left, it simply downloads the PDF (to my chosen "Save files to" folder in Settings). Is there a current way to change this behavior? Is this something that the website's code determines, overriding my Firefox setting?
creator: dlabrecque

title: top border is different on Nightly
content: I have three Firefox-related browsers installed on a Linux Mint MATE system: Firefox, Nightly, and Pale Moon. I realize that Nightly is not intended for production use. That said, the top border is twice as tall as the one on Firefox and Pale Moon. This is a new system and I don't remember the border ever looking like this. The three images should illustrate the problem. Is there an about:config setting I should set?

title: Tab Bar on Firefox
content:
Hi, I'm a Firefox user since around 2004. Whenever I used FF i always opened multiple windows of FF. At some point Mozilla came out with Tabs. I don't use them and as a matter of fact I use the option under settings to open links in a new window (not tabs). Always have, Why? Habit I guess from the times I first starting using FF. I seriously don't use Tabs. I would like to Remove the Tab Bar from FF because of this reason and it frees up a lot of visual space on my browser. I've spent hours reading/searching/trying on "how" to remove or at least hide the Tab Bar. Waste of time so far, so I decided to Post the Question.

How Do I Hide or Remove the Tab Bar in FireFox?

Thanks For Everyone's Help in Advance:-)

creator: kmrussell

title: Types wrong characters intermittanly.
content:
Machine is Windows 10 with a Logitech wireless keyboard. Latest Firefox browser. Not always but sometimes when using Firefox browser to log in somewhere or enter data on some web site, I'll get an incorrect entry for a key stroke. e.g. I enter a 0 and get a 1. But if I enter a 1 I get a 1. So far the error key has always been different.

I've tested things by launching a notepad or Word document and entering the character and in those all works fine. But go back to Firefox and I get the error again. What I have to do is to close and re-launch Firefox and so far this fixes things. It's an intermittent problem which forces me to keep another browser on the machine and ready. Imagine entering a password when all of a sudden you type 'X' and it gives you an 'E'. Really frustrating!
creator: kevink001

title: Falha na conexao de um determinado site
content:
Olá, desde ontem não consigo mais abrir um site que uso a trabalho, e antes usava normal no firefox, em outros navegadores consigo abrir normalmente, mas eu só gosto de usar o firefox. não consigo resolver. Gostaria muito de continuar a usar o firefox mas se não conseguir acessar de novo este site não vou mais poder usar.

Site: https://www.mercadoturbo.com.br/mt/ (esta página ele ainda abre normal) https://app.mercadoturbo.com.br/sistema/home (está que onde eu faço o login para acessar) NÃO ENTRA nos outros navegadores como mencionei esta acessando normal https://app.mercadoturbo.com.br/auth/a
creator: fechinarelli

title: print page footer format &D date format
content:
When printing a page to PDF, with headers & footers, the default setup shows the date in right footer. However this date format is in (for me) awkward US format . Is there a way to show the date according to system regional short date & time ?


info: OS: windows 10 pro 

 date format: YYYY-MM-DD  time format: hh:mm (24-hr)

FF: 120.0.1 (latest to date) FF about:config -> print.print_footerright = &D FF &D format: MM/D/YYYY, h:mm PM (12-hr)
creator: Robl2

title: acesso a conta gov.br
content: Nos últimos dias, a minha conta gov.br não consegue ser acessada pelo navegador Firefox. Algumas novas ferramentas de segurança foram implantadas pelo gov.br que podem estar inviabilizando o login. Uma das ferramentas se chama "gerenciador de dispositivos" porém já dei permissão para o acesso ao navegador Firefox pelo meu IP. Outros navegadores apresentam problemas... mas, são contornáveis. Porém, quero continuar usando o Firefox e preciso de ajuda para solucionar o problema. O que mais posso fazer? Além de limpeza completa de cache e desabilitar o antivírus (para teste)... que não resolveu : (

title: DeepL Translate blocked on Firefox
content: Hi everybody, since yesterday I cannot use DeepL Translate on Firefox: most of the functions are blocked. No problem with any other websites, it's just DeepL. I have not changed any of my privacy or cookie settings, so I don't understand why all of sudden it's no longer working. I can use it in Chrome but I would prefer to restore its functions in Firefox, which is my main browser. Thanks in advance for any suggestions. Have a good day.

title: Neustále pády Firefoxu
content:
Dobrý den,

včera večer jsem chtěl otevřít Firefox a pokračovat, kde jsem odpoledne přestal ve svojí práci. Po otevření Firefoxu se objevila tabulka (viz obrázek chyba 1). Všechny okna jsem tedy uzavřel, reinstaloval jsem Firefox, vyzkoušel jsem všechny rady na podpoře, co by s tím mohlo být, ale stále se mi nedaří načíst žádnou stránku. Když zadám něco do vyhledávací lišty, tak na mě vyskočí tabulka (viz obrázek chyba 2). Když se Firefox správně načte, tak se objeví prázdná stránka (viz obrázek prazdna_stranka)

Můžete mi prosím poradit? Děkuji

content: For the past 3 months or so, anytime I try to login to Sony Playstation website I can't get past entering my email. I have also tried multiple computers.
